headline: Can On Semiconductor's Expanding Treo Platform Push the Stock Higher?
summary: ON's Treo Platform delivers advanced power and sensing solutions, boosting efficiency, accuracy, and performance across automotive, healthcare, and data centers.

headline: Onsemi Introduces the Industry's Most Advanced Analog and Mixed-Signal Platform
summary: SCOTTSDALE - What's New: Today, onsemi introduced the Treo Platform, an analog and mixed-signal platform built with Bipolar-CMOS-DMOS process technology on an advanced 65nm node.This platform...
